basics.name: Rahul Yedida
basics.label: Ph.D. student
basics.summary: Research focused on deep learning in software engineering, and theoretical deep learning

work.summary: Worked on image restoration of globular clusters using convolutional neural networks.

publications.name: When SIMPLE is better than complex: On the value of very simple deep learning for GitHub and Bugzilla issue close time prediction
publications.summary: Rahul Yedida, Xueqi Yang, Tim Menzies

publications.name: Text Mining to Identify and Extract Novel Disease Treatments From Unstructured Datasets
publications.summary: Rahul Yedida, Saad Mohammad Abrar, Cleber Melo-Filho, Eugene Muratov, Rada Chirkova, Alexander Tropsha

publications.name: Improving Deep Learning for Defect Prediction (using the GHOST Hyperparameter Optimizer)
Learning to Recognize Actionable Static Code Warnings (is Intrinsically Easy)
publications.summary: Xueqi Yang, Jianfeng Chen, Rahul Yedida, Zhe Yu, Tim Menzies

publications.name: Parsimonious Computing: A Minority Training Regime for Effective Prediction in Large Microarray Expression Data Sets

publications.summary: Shailesh Sridhar, Snehanshu Saha, Azhar Shaikh, Rahul Yedida, Sriparna Saha

projects.name: NearConnect
projects.description: iOS app to connect with people nearby using multicast peer-to-peer connections.

projects.name: Personalized Chatbot
projects.description: Fine-tuned a GPT-2 345M model on 730k messages from Telegram logs to create a personalized chatbot

projects.name: Intelligent Tutoring System
projects.description: Implemented an Intelligent Tutoring System backend using a hidden Markov model and a novel question selection algorithm

projects.name: Activity Data Project
projects.description: Collected personal activity data for 9 months, grouped tasks into 30 categories. Analyzed most productive hours of the day and built a 2-layer predictive LSTM model.

projects.name: JournalBear
projects.description: Cross-platform journal application with AES-256 encryption. Rated 4/5 by Softpedia.

projects.name: Result Scraper
projects.description: Website for scraping university examination results and displaying charts and printable reports, with caching using a database.

projects.name: Video Sharing Website
projects.description: Simplified implementation of a video-sharing website with subscriptions and custom searching.

projects.name: Xtreme Calculations
projects.description: Windows math software to solve scientific and mathematical problems.

projects.name: Video Indexer
projects.description: Cross-platform desktop application to detect the time(s) a given keyword was spoken in a given video.

projects.name: Web development projects
projects.description: Projects include URL shortener, rogue-like dungeon crawler game, voting application, Simon game, land surface temperature heatmap, and mapping meteorite impacts across the globe.
